main event: On February 17, 1949, multiple observers reported seeing an unidentified aerial object in Albuquerque, N.M.
interesting points: The object was described as elliptical and larger than an aircraft,It was seen climbing at a 3Â° angle and making a sharp turn to the south,The sighting lasted between 6 to 9 minutes and involved both a civil engineering professor and military guards as witnesses,The object emitted no sound and left behind a faint trail of smoke,Several reports were filed through official channels detailing the observations.
witness description: civil engineering professor and military guards from Sandia Base
